name: Alterra
description:
Alterra is a 2D Space Shooter is a game about a person that wakes up in a strangely familiar spacecraft and takes the side of the Insurgents,  The only group that did not immediately open fire on them.  Together you will fight hordes of enemies from the systems two most dangerous factions, the Eradicators and Apotherians.

Alterra is currently in development and does not have much in terms of content as of now, if you would like to get involved in production, a discord link is listed below.

Discord link -
https://discord.gg/qWwkcUuREE
